title: test: floating point in note handler on Plan 9
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

% cd test
% go tool 8g divmod.go
% go tool 8l -o 8.divmod divmod.8
% 8.divmod

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

% 8.divmod
sys: trap: divide error pc=0x00018303
PC=0x400018303

8.divmod 70631: suicide: sys: floating point in note handler pc=0x0001c696

This issues appears on:

 - divmod.go
 - recover2.go
 - recover3.go

More details on the output from the builder:

http://build.golang.org/log/e89fcc53813242c37334ec9d46ef25e08e067c05
